name: Skilled Home Health Care
description: To qualify for Skilled Home Health Care, a patient must meet these three criteria: - Homebound, meaning it is difficult and taxing for you to leave your home and you need assistance to do so. - Have a diagnosis and/or treatment plan that requires medically necessary skilled nursing or rehabilitation. - Patients always need to be under care of a physician while on HH services. Services Include: - Skilled assessment and teaching - Home IV therapy - Medication management - Enterostomal therapy - Wo
